title: FastRhockey Walkthrough
text: can install released version fastRhockey GitHub : prefer devtools installation: package installed, ’s ton stuff can . Let’s start finding game ’re interested , say, 2021 Isobel Cup Championship Boston Pride won. couple quick filters/selects later ’ve pared data manageable return. can see Boston Pride beat Minnesota Whitecaps 4-3 Warrior Ice Arena March 27th, 2021. important column return game_id column. Let’s take game_id plug another fastRhockey function, time using phf_team_box function pull boxscore data game. , ’ve selected specific columns, example data returned phf_team_box function! counting stat data shots/goals, aggregated period, power play data, faceoff data, often team takes/gives away puck. ’s definitely helpful data believe really fun projects can done just phf_team_box function, really good stuff still coming. Turn attention phf_pbp, function created return PHF play--play data given game (.e. whole reason fastRhockey exists). ’s similar format boxscore function input necessary game_id want. Loading single game take ~ 5 seconds. , ’s time fun. phf_pbp function returns 78 columns, “boring” data, like teams , etc. get columns look much time remaining quarter, home skater vs away skater numbers , event occurred, involved, . ’s data took shot (shot occurs), well primary (secondary) assisters goalie . Penalties recorded + time assigned trip box. One interesting findings PHF set-ID five offensive players ice goal scored, ’s available well. Unfortunately, ’s hard derive sort plus/minus stat since ’s offensive players time goal. offensive defensive lineups provided create +/-, remains reach now. ’s example things one can now build play--play data generated phf_pbp. quick graph showing cumulative shot attempts point game Boston Minnesota.  ’s simple graph, one can easily help illustrate game flow. Pride’s shots came bunches, taking ton halfway first third periods respectively. Minnesota started game slowly, shots came fairly consistently throughout game. ’s much can explored play--play data, whether want explore winning faceoff leads shot attempt chaos can follow giveaways. ’s quick primer main functions package. phf_schedule returns schedule information game_ids, can used phf_team_box phf_pbp return boxscore play--play data. phf_game_all wraps boxscore/play--play several game summary tables one returns list dataframes: plays, team_box, skaters, goalies, game_details, scoring_summary, shootout_summary, penalty_summary, officials, team_staff, timeouts. last function may use phf_league_info, essentially pulls lot background info league IDs used. output function gets wrapped phf_schedule, ’s main purpose. look fastRhockey::, functions available, helper functions pull raw data (phf_game_raw) process raw data usable format (helper_phf____).

text: dbdir Directory database shall located dbname File name existing desired SQLite database within dbdir tblname name play play data table within database force_rebuild Hybrid parameter (logical numeric) rebuild parts complete play play data table within database (please see details information) db_connection DBIConnection object, returned DBI::dbConnect() (please see details information)

title: Update or create a fastRhockey NHL play-by-play database — update_nhl_db
text: Logical TRUE/FALSE

title: Update or create a fastRhockey NHL play-by-play database — update_nhl_db
text: function creates updates data table name tblname within SQLite database (drivers via db_connection) located dbdir named dbname. data table combines play play data every available game back 2010 season adds recent completed games soon available fastRhockey. argument force_rebuild hybrid type. can rebuild play play data table either whole fastRhockey era (force_rebuild = TRUE) just specified seasons (e.g. force_rebuild = c(2019, 2020)). Please note following behavior: force_rebuild = TRUE: data table name tblname removed completely rebuilt scratch. helpful new columns added -Season. force_rebuild = c(2019, 2020): data table name tblname preserved rows 2019 2020 seasons deleted re-added. intended used ongoing seasons ESPN's data provider can make changes underlying data week. parameter db_connection intended advanced users want use DBI drivers, MariaDB, Postgres odbc. Please note arguments dbdir dbname dropped case db_connection provided argument tblname still used write data table database.
